analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0x80598b7204f982557d565987d32e37d909e7c244.sol:
	Contract BITFAM has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0x80598b7204f982557d565987d32e37d909e7c244.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0x80598b7204f982557d565987d32e37d909e7c244.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
